1.title: Pilot
1.plot: Get ready for SnowBalls, jelly beans and dinosaurs. Introducing Totally Random, a hilarious sketch-comedy web TV series for kids 7-11! In this episode, learn what TotallyRandom.tv is all about and find out what happens when the Internet breaks. Each episode of Totally Random is full of member's digital creations, off-the-wall skits, puppets, music and a lot of other crazy stuff. We showcase the best user-created content, while setting the stage for the seeds and themes of the next episode's challenges. We task you to come up with cool new content, all the while ...

2.title: Ryley Loses the Clicker!
2.plot: Mason practices his voice for the World Wide Web and Ryley ends up floating in the black abyss of digital coding while on a mission to find the clicker. Tune in to see if your SnowBalls are featured on the show in Episode 2 "Ryley Loses the Clicker!".

3.title: TR Kids Throw a Party!
3.plot: Hey Totally Random creators! The SnowBalls you've made over the summer were so good the TR kids are throwing a party, and you're invited! Tune in to Episode 3 "TR Kids Throw a Party!" to catch the ultimate food fight of all time. Don't get too close though, the lockers get a little queasy about being back at school.

4.title: The SnowBall Stallion
4.plot: Ryley gets into the ring to fight for the "SnowBall Stallion" title with a little help from coach Jayden and some SnowBall backup.

5.title: Ryley Tops the Internet Charts
5.plot: Nibbles and Jack get into a squabble over the price of plastic bags at the hardware store and Ryley tries to be the Internet's next greatest superstar by debuting her first music video for ONE EARRING GIRL with the help of Jayden, Mason and rapper Devin Atherton.

6.title: Gnomes Away
6.plot: Jayden tackles a science project with the help of her lucky black thumb and the sneaky magic of a garden gnome. Strange things happen when the gnome escapes and takes over the TR Hangout! Tune in to find out what happens when the Flower Power gets out of hand!

7.title: Dinosaur Telethon
7.plot: When the last living dinosaur's life hangs by a thread, only a desperate plea for cash will keep him alive. But money isn't the only obstacle. Will they overcome the odds and keep the last living dinosaur alive? Tune in for some totally triassic randomness!

8.title: Mason P.I. & the Great Internet Debacle
8.plot: In a world where the internet has lost its connection... only one man... er, boy... can find the truth... But will his skill with the ladies interfere with his ability to solve this mystery? Or will his passion for payment prevail? Find out if super sleuth Mason P.I. can help his damsel sisters in distress or if the lost connection will destroy the world as we know it.

imdb.plot outline: Totally Random is a hilarious skit-comedy webseries and interactive website for kids 7-11. It is an online entertainment experience where kids can express themselves without limitations or expectations. The proprietary technology that drives the site allows for a safe and reliable experience to explore individual creativity, innovation and imagination while sharing the experience with a larger, social network of kids.
imdb.title: Totally Random
plot: _Totally Random_ (qv) is a hilarious skit-comedy webseries.::Mountain Road Productions
